TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IClientMessageInspector

summary.span: 定义一个消息检查器对象，该对象可以添加到 集合来查看或修改消息。

span.span: Defines a message inspector object that can be added to the collection to view or modify messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现 接口并将其添加到 集合，以便在消息通过 WCF 客户端对象时检查或修改消息。Implement the interface and add it to the collection to inspect or modify messages as they pass through a WCF client object. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For details, see . ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示一个实现，当调用该实现时将字符串写入控制台。The following code example shows an implementation that writes strings to the console when the implementation is called. [!code-csharp[Interceptors#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/cs/interceptors.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Interceptors#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/vb/interceptors.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例显示如何使用 在客户端终结点中插入客户端消息检查器。The following code example shows how to use an to insert the client message inspector in the client endpoint. [!code-csharp[Interceptors#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/cs/insertingbehaviors.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Interceptors#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/vb/insertingbehaviors.vb#2)] 最后，下面的代码示例显示如何修改客户端配置文件，将终结点行为与特定的终结点一起使用。Finally, the following code example shows how to modify the client configuration file to use the endpoint behavior with a particular endpoint. [!code-xml[Interceptors#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/cs/client.exe.config#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void AfterReceiveReply (ref System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message reply, object correlationState);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AfterReceiveReply(class System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message& reply, object correlationState) cil managed
Public Sub AfterReceiveReply (ByRef reply As Message, correlationState As Object)
abstract member AfterReceiveReply : Message * obj -> unit

param.name: reply
param.span: 要转换为类型并交回给客户端应用程序的消息。

span.span: The message to be transformed into types and handed back to the client application.

summary.span: 在收到回复消息之后将它传递回客户端应用程序之前，启用消息的检查或修改。

span.span: Enables inspection or modification of a message after a reply message is received but prior to passing it back to the client application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现此方法 可在 WCF 客户端对象收到答复消息后，但在将其反序列化为返回给客户端应用程序的对象之前，对其进行检查或修改。Implement to inspect or modify a reply message after it has been received by the WCF client object but before it is deserialized into objects that are returned to the client application. 为此消息调用 `correlationState` 时， 是用户返回的对象。The `correlationState` is the object returned by the user when is called for this message. 最佳做法是将它设置为 ，以确保没有两个相同的 `correlationState` 对象。The best practice is to make this a to ensure that no two `correlationState` objects are the same. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示一个实现，当调用该实现时将字符串写入控制台。The following code example shows an implementation that writes strings to the console when the implementation is called. [!code-csharp[Interceptors#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/cs/interceptors.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Interceptors#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/vb/interceptors.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例显示如何使用 在客户端终结点中插入客户端消息检查器。The following code example shows how to use an to insert the client message inspector in the client endpoint. [!code-csharp[Interceptors#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/cs/insertingbehaviors.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Interceptors#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/vb/insertingbehaviors.vb#2)] 最后，下面的代码示例显示如何修改客户端配置文件，将终结点行为与特定的终结点一起使用。Finally, the following code example shows how to modify the client configuration file to use the endpoint behavior with a particular endpoint. [!code-xml[Interceptors#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/cs/client.exe.config#3)]

span.span: The message to be sent to the service.

summary.span: 在将请求消息发送到服务之前，启用消息的检查或修改。

span.span: Enables inspection or modification of a message before a request message is sent to a service.

returns.span: 作为 方法的 参数返回的对象。

span.span: The object that is returned as the argument of the method.

returns.span: 如果不使用关联状态，则为 。

span.span: This is if no correlation state is used.

returns.span: 最佳做法是将它设置为 ，以确保没有两个相同的 对象。

span.span: The best practice is to make this a to ensure that no two objects are the same.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在发送请求消息之前，实现 来检查或修改请求消息。Implement the to inspect or modify a request message before it is sent. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示一个实现，当调用该实现时将字符串写入控制台。The following code example shows an implementation that writes strings to the console when the implementation is called. [!code-csharp[Interceptors#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/cs/insertingbehaviors.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Interceptors#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/vb/insertingbehaviors.vb#2)] 最后，下面的代码示例显示如何修改客户端配置文件，将终结点行为与特定的终结点一起使用。Finally, the following code example shows how to modify the client configuration file to use the endpoint behavior with a particular endpoint.
